job_description:
• Degree from a University or Engineering School in Computer Science, Mathematics, Electronic / Electrical Engineering, or other related field.
• Ability to make trade-offs between power, performance and area appropriately to meet product requirements.
• Strong RTL design skills in Verilog, SystemVerilog or VHDL.
• “Nice To Have” Skills and Experience : Working experience in digital design.
• Required Skills and Experience : Experienced Professionals.
• Knowledge of scripting languages like Perl, TCL or Python.
• Knowledge of computer architecture.
